comments:
Description:
NPE throws out when specify grand total aggregation on the second measure[1102]
Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070417-0630
Steps to reproduce:
1, New a cross tab with only one dimension and two measures:
   REGION  QUANTITY  PRICE
2, Specify the aggregation on the dimension REGION
   Grand total on PRICE

Actual result:
The NPE throws out, and if minimize the Workbench and Maximize the workbench again, the cross tab disappeared.

The report design file is destroyed, so it is critical
Please handle the NPE, since the empty cells in xtab is already handled by GUI.

In this case, there should be cells, so GUI will not handle this case.
We only handle the case the design file is logically valid with some empty cells. In this case, the design file is not logically valid.
